definition: the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Xi'an, sub-provincial city and capital of Shaanxi 陝西省|陕西省[Shan3 xi1 Sheng3] in northwest China/see 西安區|西安区[Xi1 an1 qu1]
Shanxi province (Shansi) in north China between Hebei and Shaanxi, abbr. 晋 capital Taiyuan 太原
Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区 in South Central China, on the border with Vietnam, abbr. 桂, capital Nanning 南寧|南宁/until 1959, Guangxi province
Tibet/Xizang or Tibetan autonomous region 西藏自治區|西藏自治区
Shaanxi (formerly Shensi), province in northwest China, abbr. 陝|陕[Shan3], capital Xi’an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4]
Jiangxi province (Kiangsi) in southeast China, abbr. 赣, capital Nanchang 南昌

sentences.english: On WHT and many other places, you only hear about it when it messes up.
sentences.chinese: 在西隧和许多其他地方，你只能听到它时它弄乱。

sentences.english: If I were you, however, I would go south for one more league , and then take the fork west.
sentences.chinese: 我要是你，我就再向南走三英里，到达岔路后向西。

sentences.english: Dr Sivak said this might be due to height difference between the sexes.
sentences.chinese: 西瓦克博士说，这可能是由男女身高的差异造成的。

sentences.english: A small street in Annecy, France, in late afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚时分，法国安娜西的一条小街。

sentences.english: A high mountain range, the Trans–Antarctic range, runs from east to west, cutting the continent in two.
sentences.chinese: 一条横贯南极洲的山脉，从东到西将南极洲分为两半。

sentences.english: Three is afraid of in some way yet but would have died, free grudge.
sentences.chinese: 三是怕某些心愿尚未了却便就此撒手西去，空余遗恨。

sentences.english: If they take us alive, they will deliver us to Ramsay.
sentences.chinese: 若被他们生擒，我们会被直接交给拉姆西。

sentences.english: So this was the reason for our trip to Portsea.
sentences.chinese: 这么说，我们到波特西旅行就是这个原因。

sentences.english: Generally, WNV is spread by the bite of an infected mosquito.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，西尼罗河病毒是由受到感染的蚊子传播的。

sentences.english: Next Station, Hung Hom, interchange station for the West Rail Line.
sentences.chinese: 红磡，乘客可以换乘西铁线。

sentences.english: Hand gestures are commonly known as Mudras in Odissi dancing.
sentences.chinese: 手势通常被称为奥迪西手印在跳舞。

sentences.english: Others were reported in the south of Western Sahara.
sentences.chinese: 另外，西撒哈拉沙漠南部也有蝗灾的报告。

sentences.english: Epsilon lies at the western edge of the constellation .
sentences.chinese: 星位于这个星座的西边缘。

sentences.english: And by the border of Dan, from the east side unto the west side, a portion for Asher.
sentences.chinese: 挨着但的地界，从东到西，是亚设的一分。

sentences.english: When Moses was at Mount Sinai God chose to reveal his face.
sentences.chinese: 摩西在西乃山上时，上帝定意显明祂的面。

sentences.english: He traversed alone the whole continent of Africa from east to west.
sentences.chinese: 他独自一人从东到西横越整个非洲大陆。

definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Xihe county in Longnan 隴南|陇南[Long3 nan2], Gansu
